  1. """Models for the ``hero_slider`` app."""
  2. from django.contrib.contenttypes import generic
  3. from django.contrib.contenttypes.models import ContentType
  4. from django.db import models
  5. from django.utils.translation import get_language
  6. from django.utils.translation import ugettext_lazy as _
  8. from simple_translation.utils import get_preferred_translation_from_lang
  11. from filer.fields.file import FilerFileField
  14. class SliderItemManager(models.Manager):
  15. """Custom manager for the ``SliderItem`` model."""
  16. def published(self, request):
  17. """
  18. Returns the published slider items in the current language.
  20. :param request: A Request instance.
  22. """
  23. language = getattr(request, 'LANGUAGE_CODE', None)
  24. if not language:
  25. return self.model.objects.none()
  26. qs = self.get_query_set()
  27. qs = qs.filter(
  28. slideritemtitle__is_published=True,
  29. slideritemtitle__language=language,
  30. )
  31. return qs
  34. class SliderItem(models.Model):
  35. """
  36. Resembles an item that should be shown on the front page in a slider.
  38. For translateable fields see the ``SliderItemTitle`` model.
  40. :image: A filer file. This will be the image shown in the slider.
  41. :position: Can be set in order to control the ordering of the slider items.
  42. :content_type: The contenttype of the object this slider item links to.
  43. :object_id: The PK of the object this slider item links to.
  45. """
  46. image = FilerFileField(
  47. verbose_name=_('Image'),
  48. )
  50. position = models.PositiveIntegerField(
  51. verbose_name=_('Position'),
  52. null=True, blank=True,
  53. )
  55. # Generic foreign key
  56. content_type = models.ForeignKey(ContentType)
  57. object_id = models.PositiveIntegerField()
  58. content_object = generic.GenericForeignKey('content_type', 'object_id')
  60. objects = SliderItemManager()
  62. def get_trans(self):
  63. """Returns the translation object for this slider item."""
  64. lang = get_language()
  65. return get_preferred_translation_from_lang(self, lang)
  68. class SliderItemTitle(models.Model):
  69. """
  70. Translateable fields of the ``SliderItem`` model.
  72. :title: The title of this slider item.
  73. :description: A short description of this slider item.
  74. :is_published: If True, this will not show up.
  76. """
  77. title = models.CharField(
  78. max_length=256,
  79. verbose_name=_('Title'),
  80. blank=True,
  81. )
  83. description = models.CharField(
  84. max_length=512,
  85. verbose_name=_('Description'),
  86. blank=True,
  87. )
  89. is_published = models.BooleanField(
  90. verbose_name=_('Is published'),
  91. default=False,
  92. )
  94. # Needed by simple-translation
  95. slider_item = models.ForeignKey(SliderItem, verbose_name=_('Slider item'))
  96. language = models.CharField(max_length=2, verbose_name=_('Language'))
